description: Motherwell sign up former St Johnstone forward Theo Bair on a two-year contract.
title: Motherwell: Theo Bair signs two-year deal after St Johnstone exit
title_page: Motherwell: Theo Bair signs two-year deal after St Johnstone exit - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Motherwell is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
